messages.message:
x-post https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C02LZFX0PPH/p1746080780177789?thread_ts=1745581738.010949&cid=C02LZFX0PPH

Hi everyone, in case you missed it — our engineering team has successfully upgraded us to the latest version of Go (1.24)! :tada:

This upgrade not only brings all the great new features of Go 1.24, but also addresses several vulnerabilities that existed due to the previously used end-of-life version.

While many team members contributed to this effort, I’d like to give a special shoutout to @Cody Boggs, @William Helmrath, @Anil, and @Heymian for their leadership and dedication in making this happen.

Great work, team!
